text: The names of the colours of the iMac are unchanged
full-pick-text: The names of the colours of the iMac are unchanged
notes: • Cleverly worded so that if the iMac isn't touched, the pick is still correct, but Federico's questioning of whether a change in hue counts causes Myke to water it down to just names. At the time of the pick, the colors were "Blue, Green, Pink, Silver, Yellow, Orange, Purple".
